price: Kisha akawa kidonge cha damu, tena Mwenyezi Mungu akamuumba na akamtengeneza vilivyo.
footnotes: Kisha hiyo tone ikawa kipande cha damu iliyo ganda, na Mwenyezi Mungu akaiumba, akaisawazisha mpaka ikawa na umbo zuri?

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
